member.summary: Converts a value to an Option<T>.

member.summary: A generic Option type that allows for an explicit difference between an intentionally set value, and a default value of None.

member.name: M:Functional.Option.Option`1.op_Equality(Functional.Option.Option{`0},Functional.Option.Option{`0})
member.summary: Comapares two options for equality.
member.param: The option on the left hand side.
The option on the right hand side.
member.returns: true if the options' values are equal or both options are Option<T>.None, and false if the options' values are not equal or only one option is Option<T>.None

member.name: M:Functional.Option.Option`1.op_Inequality(Functional.Option.Option{`0},Functional.Option.Option{`0})
member.summary: Comapares two options for inequality.
member.param: The option on the left hand side.
The option on the right hand side.
member.returns: true if the options' values are not equal or only one option is Option<T>.None, and false if the options' values are equal or both options are Option<T>.None.

member.summary: Compares the option to another option for equality.
member.param: The option to compare to.
member.returns: true if the options' values are equal or both options are Option<T>.None, and false if the options' values are not equal or only one option is Option<T>.None

member.name: M:Functional.Option.Option`1.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the Option

member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the Option

member.name: M:Functional.Option.Option`1.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares the option to another object for equality.
member.param: The object to compare to.
member.returns: true if the object is an Option<T> and the options' values are equal or both options are Option<T>.None, and false if the object is not an Option<T> or the options' values are not equal or only one option is Option<T>.None
